name: Skywhisper Koi
description: Alpine koi that glide through the charged rivers of the Howling Peaks. Their scales hum with static energy.

name: Emberfin Eel
description: Molten caverns breed these eels whose fins glow with emberlight. Popular with pyromancers and chefs alike.

name: Gloomscale Piranha
description: A razor-toothed predator from the shadowed pools of the Gloomwild. Its scales refract ambient light into violet sheens.

name: Frostgill Trout
description: Hardy river trout that thrive in glacial runoffs. Favored by settlers for hearty stews.

name: Mycelial Shrimp
description: Bioluminescent crustaceans that feed on subterranean fungi. Their shells pulse softly in the dark.

name: Moonlure Jelly
description: A spectral jellyfish attracted to leyline tides. Distilling its essence boosts alchemical potency.

name: Rusty Multi-Tool
description: A battered bundle of implements barely held together. Better than bare hands, but only just.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: A reliable stone pickaxe reinforced with mosswoven bindings.

name: Stormforged Pickaxe
description: Forged in Tempest Forges, this pick cleaves ore veins and channels lightning into every strike.

name: Kweebec Hatchet
description: Lightweight hatchet carved from ancient bark, perfect for trimming grove growth.

name: Gloomreaper Sickle
description: Veil-steeped sickle that glides through shadow flora, coaxing rare reagents from the dark.

name: Harvester's Scythe
description: Balanced scythe used by frontier farmers to slice wide swaths of enchanted grain.

name: Planar Cultivator
description: An ornate cultivator that channels ley harmonics to supercharge crop cycles.

name: Makeshift Fishing Rod
description: A simple rod fashioned from grove timber and woven fibers. Humble but dependable.

name: Skysong Harpoon
description: Charged harpoon that rides ambient resonance to reel in aerial and aquatic catches.

name: Abyssal Reel
description: Mystic reel woven with lunar jellies that tempts even eldritch denizens of the deep.

name: Whisperroot Sap
description: Syrupy sap tapped from whisperroots; hums softly when exposed to moonlight.

name: Mosswoven Fiber
description: Springy fiber spun from moss blankets. A staple thread for Kweebec artisans.

name: Luster Seed
description: Seed pods that glow gently; prized for accelerating greenhouse sprouting.

name: Bloomcap Spore
description: Fluffy spores shaken loose from towering bloomcaps. Useful for fermentations.

name: Kweebec Honey
description: Sweet, resinous honey harvested from grove hives. A natural energizer.

name: Sylvan Thread
description: Thread spun from bark-veins and enchanted dew, famed for its resilience.

name: Tempest Thread
description: Charged filament collected from the Howling Peaks. Flexible, conductive, and coveted.

name: Skycarved Quartz
description: Crystalline shards etched by gale currents. Stores static energy within each facet.

name: Stormfeather Bundle
description: A wrap of aviary feathers crackling with latent charge.

name: Galevine
description: Wind-twisted vine that never stops swaying. Ideal for flexible lashings.

name: Lightning Resin
description: Viscous resin that stores storm charges. Used to supercharge engines and tools.

name: Aetheric Ore
description: Dense ore that oscillates between phases. Essential for planar stabilizers.

name: Slagheart Fragment
description: Heat-shielded shard chipped from molten slaghearts, still warm to the touch.

name: Lavafern Leaf
description: A hardy leaf that thrives beside lavafalls, infused with ember spores.

name: Smoldering Pearl
description: Pearls forged within magma eddies, radiating gentle heat.

name: Cinder Bloom
description: Ash-tipped petals that combust when crushed. Used in incendiary brews.

name: Igneous Powder
description: Finely ground volcanic powder that sparks when exposed to air.

name: Embered Seed
description: Seed kernels that glow like coals. Favored by ember farmers for resilient crops.

name: Shadeleaf
description: Silky leaves that drink in light. Ground into tonics for night vision.

name: Midnight Truffle
description: A rare truffle that glows with inner starlight. Revered by Gloomwild chefs.

name: Veilvine
description: Shadow-creeping vine that clings to twilight groves. Used for stealth charms.

name: Phantom Pollen
description: Gossamer pollen that vanishes on touch. Harnessed in planar rituals.

name: Lumishroom
description: Bioluminescent fungus that lights the deepest groves.

name: Nocturne Sap
description: Inky sap that resonates with moon phases. Essential for high-tier alchemy.

name: Glacier Ore
description: Frostbound ore pried from Borea's glacier walls. Brittle until tempered with resin.

name: Frostpine Resin
description: Sap harvested from frostpine trees, thick and bitter with tundra chill.

name: Snowmelt Barley
description: Cold-resistant grain cultivated beneath ice shelters in Borea.

name: Icefin Perch
description: A chillwater fish whose fins grow crystalline ridges. Valued for hearty stews.

name: Sunspire Glass
description: Desert-forged glass that refracts mirage light into usable energy.

name: Dune Silk
description: Fine silk spun by dune spiders, resilient against sandstorms.

name: Mirage Grain
description: Golden grain irrigated by dew harvesters; shimmers when heated.

name: Sandray Skate
description: A gliding desert ray that dives into mirage pools. Its fins dry into potent spices.

name: Windhollow Shard
description: Shards carved by cliffside vortices, humming with stored gale energy.

name: Skyroot Bark
description: Resilient bark from trees clinging to Gale Cliff ledges, braided by constant winds.

name: Cliffgrain Seed
description: Hardy grain cultivated in terraced cliff farms, rich in mineral salts.

name: Stormwake Tuna
description: Deepwater tuna that surface during tempests along Gale Cliffs.

name: Voidblack Ore
description: A dense ore steeped in shadow energy, quarried from the Shadow Realm.

name: Nightveil Leaf
description: Leaves that bloom only in voidlight, prized for cloaking brews.

name: Nether Sporegrain
description: Spores cultivated in shadow loams, ground into nourishing but eerie flour.

name: Abyssal Lamprey
description: A void-resonant eel that clings to ley tides. Distilled for shadow tonics.

name: Ashglass Core
description: A glassy core formed where ash cyclones meet magma vents.

name: Magma Lichen
description: Heat-loving lichen that clings to basalt and glows with ember spores.

name: Pyrebloom Seed
description: Seed pods that ignite when cracked, essential for fire-infused crops.

name: Searing Lanternfish
description: Lava-tide fish whose bioluminescence burns bright crimson.

name: Tideglass Pearl
description: A radiant pearl grown within reef altars, amplifying tidecaller songs.

name: Kelpweave Fiber
description: Braided kelp strands hardened by salt currents, ideal for waterproof cloth.

name: Choral Marrow
description: Resonant marrow extracted from living coral columns.

name: Deepcurrent Salmon
description: A muscular salmon that swims the submarine rivers of Tidecaller depths.

name: Bloodoak Sap
description: Resin tapped from scarlet oaks, thick and iron-rich.

name: Scarlet Clover
description: A hardy clover that nourishes scarlet forest soils and glows at dusk.

name: Thornvine Pod
description: Seed pods bristling with venomous thorns, used in potent poisons.

name: Crimson Pike
description: Predatory river fish whose scales stain red from iron-rich waters.

name: Wyrmroot Tuber
description: A dense tuber entwined with wyrmroot veins, packed with restorative essences.

name: Sporeglass Cluster
description: Translucent fungal clusters that refract bioluminescent spores.

name: Venom Bulb
description: Bulbous pods containing potent paralytic sap from Wyrmroot Hollow.

name: Gloomlamp Catfish
description: A bioluminescent catfish that navigates toxic pools with glowing barbels.

name: Prismatic Shard
description: Crystal splinters suffused with refracted aurora light.

name: Glimmerdew Petals
description: Petals soaked in dew that fluoresces under moonlight.

name: Auroral Grain
description: Grain cultivated in prism greenhouses, storing aurora energy.

name: Spectral Ribbonfish
description: A translucent fish that trails bands of light through the Prismatic Refuge.
